dhanabalayen,marabalayen udamwi rajyabalaya upayogi karagena waradikala wunta danduwam kirima aniwaryen sidukala yuthu wana atharama ese dushithayinta erehiwa nithiya kriyathmaka kirimata pramukhathawa denna sema dushithayin,minimaruwan bihikarana,aarakshakarana wyawasthawe pahadili wenasak,swadhina komishan sabha sthapanaya kirima wani janathawadi de me dina 100 thula sidukirimata yahapalana aanduwa pramukhathawa diyayuthu wana athara ese sidukirimata bahuthara wipakshaye sahaya nolabenam sidukala yuthuwa thibune aanduwa wisuruwa hara mahamathiwaranayakata yamayi.namuth dan siduwenne yahapalane namayen paksha,wipaksha siyalu dushithayin ekama wedikawakata ekathuwi ekineka samaga sahayogayen ekineka aaraksha kara ganimata sudanam wimayi.
